resources.string: Instructions are phrased in the masculine but address all genders
Draw a clock with all the numbers showing the time 11:10
Note: When drawing, make sure only your finger or pen is touching the tablet
You finished the first stage, now we move to the next stage
Before you is a clock showing twelve o\'clock, you need to set the clock by moving the hands
The test has ended, thank you for your cooperation
Please score the clock test displayed before you
This will erase everything you've drawn. This action cannot be undone.
Thank you for completing the Clock Drawing Test. Press Exit to submit your results.

string-array.name: circle_grades
string-array.item: 2 - Complete shape
1 - Incomplete shape or with line continuation
0 - No circle or extreme distortion

string-array.name: numbers_grades
string-array.item: 4 - All numbers in correct order with consistent spacing
3 - Minor mistakes
2 - Missing/extra numbers or arranged counterclockwise
1 - About half of the numbers are missing
0 - Most numbers are missing

string-array.name: hands_grades
string-array.item: 4 - Hands in correct position and size
3 - Slight deviation or no size difference
2 - Significant errors
1 - Only one hand or poor display
0 - No hands

string-array.name: missions_v_1
string-array.item: The clock shows twelve o'clock. Adjust the clock by moving the hands two hours and thirty minutes forward.
Adjust the clock two hours and fifty minutes backward.

string-array.name: missions_v_2
string-array.item: The clock shows twelve o'clock. Adjust the clock by moving the hands three hours and twenty minutes forward.
Adjust the clock one hour and forty minutes backward.

string-array.name: missions_v_3
string-array.item: The clock shows twelve o'clock. Move the hands one hour and thirty minutes forward.
Move the clock fifty minutes backward.

string-array.name: missions_v_4
string-array.item: The clock shows twelve o'clock. Move the hands one hour and fifty minutes backward.
Move the clock two hours and forty minutes forward.

string-array.name: missions_v_5
string-array.item: The clock shows twelve o'clock. Move the hands forty minutes forward.
Move the clock one hour and twenty-five minutes forward.
